dmca.title: Confused About Rights?
dmca.body:
Dear PartyBois.net,
 
This letter is to inform you that you website at www.partybois.net is believed to be in violation of our copyright.  While every website is unique we feel that the concepts, words and claims that are being made on your website are deceptive with the specific intent to deceive Internet users that your website is affiliated with our copyrighted material. 
 
MicroIdeas, Inc, is the parent company of GetGuyz and has held the copyright on this material since March of 2001. 
 
We hereby demand that you cease and desist immediately the use and stated affiliation with CollegePartyBoys, CollegPartyBois, USA PartyBoys, USA PartyBois.  We recognize that the term PartyBois is a term of your website and the word by itself is not copyrightable under current US Copyright law, however your claim and affiliation for the specific terms we have identified is deceptive and misleading and does violate US Copyright Law.
 
If you fail to comply with this notice within ten (10) days (by December 2, 2005) we will pursue further legal action in efforts to protect our property.  Should you have any questions please contact us immediately.
 
[private]
MicroIdeas, Inc.
